app_descript:
Brief

Gaspy is an invaluable tool for motorists looking to save money at the pump. This app collates real-time information on gas prices from various stations, enabling users to locate the cheapest fuel options within their vicinity. Designed for savvy drivers in New Zealand, Gaspy is all about community-driven data, where users contribute to and benefit from the collective knowledge of gas prices nationwide.
